exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.CheckBoxSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="checkbox_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="checkbox_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="checkbox_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="checkbox_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HScrollBarSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="8" width="30" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HSliderSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_sb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
             height="6" verticalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ItemRendererSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" text="{data}" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.PanelSkin" minHeight="230" minWidth="450" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="border_png" scale9Grid="2,2,12,12" />
    <e:Group id="moveArea" left="0" right="0" top="0" height="45">
        <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="header_png"/>
        <e:Label id="titleDisplay" size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0xFFFFFF"
                 wordWrap="false" left="15" right="5" verticalCenter="0"/>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Button id="closeButton" label="close" bottom="5" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ProgressBarSkin" minWidth="30" minHeight="18" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="track_pb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
			 height="100%" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="100%" width="100%" source="thumb_pb_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
			 size="15" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x707070"
			 horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.RadioButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="radiobutton_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="radiobutton_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="radiobutton_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="radiobutton_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ScrollerSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:HScrollBar id="horizontalScrollBar" width="100%" bottom="0"/>
    <e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" height="100%" right="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="skins.TextInputSkin" minHeight="40" minWidth="300" states="normal,disabled,normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" source="button_up_png"/>
	<e:Rect height="100%" width="100%" fillColor="0xffffff"/>
 	<e:EditableText id="textDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0x000000" textColor.disabled="0xff0000" width="100%" height="24" size="20" />
	<e:Label id="promptDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0xa9a9a9" width="100%" height="24" size="20" touchEnabled="false" includeIn="normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ToggleSwitchSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image source="on_png"
             source.up="off_png"
             source.down="off_png"
             source.disabled="off_png"/>
    <e:Image source="handle_png"
             horizontalCenter="-18"
             horizontalCenter.upAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.downAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.disabledAndSelected="18"
             verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VScrollBarSkin" minWidth="8" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="30" width="8" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VSliderSkin" minWidth="25" minHeight="30" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="7" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" horizontalCenter="0" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="ButtonCommonSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" states="up,down,disabled" >
	<e:Image source="button_caipiao_png" scale9Grid="16,17,61,56" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" top.disabled="0" left.disabled="0" bottom.disabled="0" right.disabled="0" top="0" right="0" bottom="0" left="0"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" text="Label" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" textColor="0x3f0c0c" size="28" size.disabled="26"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="ButtonEmptySkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" states="up,down,disabled" >
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" text="Label" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" textColor="0x3F0C0C" size="28"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="HeadViewSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image id="img" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" source="{data.p.pic}"/>
	<e:Image source="bg_headviewcircle_png" top="0" right="0" bottom="0" left="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="MyHSliderProgressSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="bg_base_goldslip_png" left="0" right="0"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" source="bg_goldslip_png" y="12" left="11" right="13" anchorOffsetX="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="MyHSliderSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<e:ProgressBar id="track" value="{maximum}" minimum="{minimum}" maximum="{maximum}" verticalCenter="0" left="0" anchorOffsetX="0" right="0" skinName="MyHSliderProgressSkin"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" verticalCenter="-1" source="button_drag_png"/>
	<e:Group id="labelComp" verticalCenter="-50">
		<e:Image x="-12" y="0" source="bg_imgbox_png" scale9Grid="22,18,82,56" height="60" anchorOffsetX="0" width="70"/>
		<e:Label id="label" text="10" y="11" size="24" touchEnabled="false" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" textColor="0xe2a918" horizontalCenter="-6.5"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="SimpleLoadingSkin" width="720" height="1280" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect id="maskRect" name="maskRect" fillAlpha="0.5" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
	<e:Image id="loadingShape" name="loadingShape" source="shape_loading_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" anchorOffsetX="89" anchorOffsetY="89"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="TooltipSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" width="560">
	<e:Rect fillAlpha="0.6" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" ellipseWidth="15" ellipseHeight="15" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
	<e:Label id="label" text="{text}" size="28" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" top="7" bottom="7" anchorOffsetX="0" left="30" right="30" textAlign="center" stroke="2" textColor="0xa9fcfc"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="Game2048Skin" width="720" height="1280" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<e:Group x="0" y="0">
		<e:Image source="bg_zsht_png" scale9Grid="84,38,508,229" width="720" height="1280" x="0" y="0"/>
		<ns1:Button notice="REMOVE_BOX" label="CLOSE" x="560" y="15" skinName="ButtonCommonSkin" width="140" height="60"/>
		<e:BitmapLabel font="font_huode_fnt" text="2048" horizontalCenter="0" top="55"/>
		<e:Button id="btnStart" label="New Game" x="477" y="114" skinName="ButtonCommonSkin" anchorOffsetX="0" width="216"/>
		<e:Group x="37" y="168">
			<e:Label x="0" y="0" text="{'SCORE  '+data.curScore}"/>
			<e:Label x="0" y="47" text="{'BEST   '+data.bestScore}"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Label text="{data.desc}" x="38" y="125"/>
		<e:Group horizontalCenter="0" y="333" width="630" height="630">
			<e:Image source="bg_ptht_png" scale9Grid="83,52,501,319" top="0" left="0" right="0" bottom="0"/>
			<e:Group id="gamePanel" top="15" left="15" right="15" bottom="15" width="600" height="600"/>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="GameOverSkin" width="720" height="1280" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect width="720" height="1280" x="0" y="0" fillAlpha="0.5"/>
    <e:Group id="gameOve" width="280" height="160" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
        <e:Rect fillColor="0xe0e0e0" fillAlpha="0.7" enabled="true" ellipseWidth="32" ellipseHeight="32" left="0" top="0" right="0" bottom="0"/>
        <e:Label text="Game Over !" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" height="60" left="0" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" bold="true" italic="true" size="35" textColor="0xff3600" width="100%" top="0"/>
        <e:Label anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" height="50" left="0" right="0" top="60" size="28" text="{data.curScore}" textAlign="center" bold="true" verticalAlign="middle" textColor="0x727272"/>
        <e:Label id="btnNewGame" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" left="0" right="0" size="28" text="New Game" textAlign="center" bold="true" verticalAlign="middle" bottom="0" textColor="0x288cff" height="50"/>
        <e:layout>
            <e:BasicLayout/>
        </e:layout>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="PanelGamesSkin" width="720" height="1280" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<e:Rect width="720" height="1280" fillAlpha="0.6"/>
	<e:Group horizontalCenter="0" top="20">
		<ns1:Button notice="GAME_OPEN_2048" label="2048" x="0" y="0" skinName="ButtonCommonSkin" width="140" height="60"/>
		<ns1:Button notice="GAME_OPEN_TURNTABLE" label="转盘" x="105" y="1" skinName="ButtonCommonSkin" width="140" height="60"/>
		<ns1:Button notice="GAME_OPEN_LAOHUJI" label="老虎机" x="212" y="2" skinName="ButtonCommonSkin" width="140" height="60"/>
		<ns1:Button notice="GAME_OPEN_LUCK_DRAW" label="九宫格抽奖" x="222" y="12" skinName="ButtonCommonSkin" width="140" height="60"/>
		<ns1:LightButton notice="REMOVE_BOX" label="CLOSE" x="311" y="0" skinName="ButtonCommonSkin" width="140" height="60"/>
		<e:layout>
			<e:TileLayout requestedColumnCount="4"/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="GameTurntableSkin" width="720" height="1280" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<e:Rect width="720" height="1280" fillAlpha="0.6"/>
	<ns1:Button notice="REMOVE_BOX" label="CLOSE" x="570" y="9" skinName="ButtonCommonSkin" width="140" height="60"/>
	<e:Image source="s3_bg_png" x="624" y="58" rotation="90"/>
	<e:Image id="imgRing" source="g_png" anchorOffsetX="252" anchorOffsetY="252" x="349" y="332"/>
	<e:Image id="imgStart" source="z_png" anchorOffsetX="108" anchorOffsetY="108" verticalCenter="-308" x="349"/>
	<ns1:LightButton id="btnStart" label="START" x="290" y="623" skinName="ButtonCommonSkin" width="140" height="60"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="HomeSkin" width="720" height="1280" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group x="0" y="0">
		<e:Image source="bg_zsht_png" scale9Grid="84,38,508,229" width="720" height="1280" x="0" y="0"/>
		<e:Image visible="false" source="bg_home_jpg" x="16" y="16" scaleX="0.95" scaleY="0.975"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="MenuSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*" width="720" height="1280">
	<e:Group bottom="20" horizontalCenter="0">
		<ns1:Button notice="OPEN_GAMNES_PANEL" label="小游戏" x="0" y="0" skinName="ButtonCommonSkin" width="140" height="60"/>
		<ns1:Button notice="OPEN_BUTTON_TEST" label="Button2" x="105" y="1" skinName="ButtonCommonSkin" width="140" height="60"/>
		<ns1:Button label="Button3" x="212" y="2" skinName="ButtonCommonSkin" width="140" height="60"/>
		<ns1:LightButton label="Button4" x="311" y="0" skinName="ButtonCommonSkin" width="140" height="60"/>
		<e:layout>
			<e:HorizontalLayout/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>
